70 enum class RaycastFlag {
71  kUseDistance = 1 << 0, // If not set, raycast will have infinite length
72  kTestTriangles = 1 << 1, // If set, iterates over mesh triangles as part of raycast
73  kSingleHit = 1 << 2, // If set, only check for a single hit
74  kSingleHitPerObject = 1 << 3, // If set, only check for a single hit per scene object
75 };
76 typedef Flags<RaycastFlag> RaycastFlags;
